bookTitle: Writer's Retreat: New York City Edition: Cafes, Restaurants & Coffee Shops for Writers, Bloggers & Students
Plot: A short and well edited guide to the best places for writers, bloggers and students. The locations are loiterer friendly with great food, coffee and staff. The list of over a hundred establishments are organized by the neighborhoods in Manhattan, Brooklyn, The Bronx, Queens, and Staten Island. A collection of Inspirational Itineraries are also included to aid in ridding you of that pesky writer's block all for less than the cost of an espresso. Available for $3.99 on www.julietcobodo.com,Amazon,B&N,i... & Sony books.
